STORIES

"EVERYDAY HUSSLE"

This photo was taken by me, at Pedro Gil Street, near Taft Avenue Manila.

This mobile peripheral’s vendor was passed by different people from students and workers but no one seems to be interested with the items he’s selling.

He then caught my attention when he started to put his head down and play with a rock.

It just made me feel grateful for what I have and not to ask for something more and just be contented with what I have for there are people who are trying to survive this world by hustling each and every day.

"THE MOST GENUINE SMILE"

I was riding a jeepey on my way home from school, and I was seating near the exit of the jeep.

As traffic gets worse along the the Tejeros intersection in Pedro Gil, I was greeted by this father and son with the most precious smile which I decided to take right away for I might regret it if I didn’t.

I asked for their permission to take the photo and then gave me “The Most Genuine Smile”.

I then give thanks to them by handing them some pocket money for giving me a great photo that describes true happiness.
